com.mdc.bot.command.game

Class Duel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mdc.bot.command.game.Duel

  • public class Duel
extends java.lang.Object
    Duel executor class. Handles duels between two users.
    Author:
    xDestx

    • Constructor Summary

      Duel(FightPlayer initiator, FightPlayer requested, net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.TextChannel channel, MDCBot b)
      It is important to make the initiator the first player

      • loadStats

        @Deprecated
public static void loadStats()
        Deprecated. 
        Load old duel stats from the old duel stats directory. Stats are now stored in the MDCUser stat collection.
